Patients also receive oral prednisone day 1-5 . Treatment repeat every 21 day 8 course . At 6 month completion chemotherapy , patient maintain partial response ( PR ) , complete response ( CR ) , unconfirmed complete response ( CRU ) receive immunotherapy .
